skill.name: template-skill
skill.description: Replace with description of the skill and when Claude should use it.
skill.summary: Replace with description of the skill and when Claude should use it.

security_audit.summary: This is an empty template skill with no executable code or configuration. No security risks identified.

content.value_statement: A starter template that provides the basic structure for creating custom Claude skills with proper frontmatter and documentation.
actual_capabilities: Provides standard SKILL.md structure with YAML frontmatter
Includes placeholder sections for skill name and description
Serves as a starting point for skill development
limitations: Contains no actual functionality - requires customization
Placeholder text must be replaced with real content
Does not include example implementations or code

use_cases.title: Creating New Skills
use_cases.description: Use this template as a starting point when developing a new custom skill for Claude

use_cases.title: Understanding Skill Structure
use_cases.description: Reference this template to understand the required format and frontmatter for Claude skills

prompt_templates.title: Customizing the Template
prompt_templates.prompt: Replace the name, description, and instructions in this template with your specific skill requirements

output_examples.output: Template provides frontmatter structure with name and description fields, plus a placeholder section for instructions

best_practices: Replace all placeholder text before deploying the skill
Include clear, specific descriptions in the frontmatter
Add detailed instructions for Claude on when and how to use the skill
Follow the YAML frontmatter format strictly

faq.question: What should I replace in this template?
faq.answer: Replace the 'name' field with your skill's identifier, the 'description' field with when Claude should use it, and add your specific instructions below the frontmatter.

faq.question: Is this template ready to use?
faq.answer: No, this is a starting point only. You must customize it with your specific skill logic and instructions before it becomes functional.
